amendatorysection.catchline: Discharge of medical debt; contributions; how treated.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The amount of interest and principal balance of medical debt discharged under the program shall not be considered income for income tax purposes as provided in section 77-2716.
(2) Contributions to the Medical Debt Relief Fund made by any private individual or private entity shall be tax deductible for income tax purposes as provided in section 77-2716.
